language.entry: At home on the front lines, she stares at the flames with morbid fascination; the heart's pounding drowning out the smith's hammer. The Offering stands at the head of the group, more than happy to shield her allies from whatever might end the heart's beat.
No stranger to suffering, the Offering fanatically shields her allies from a similar demise. There are countless ways to stop a heart's beat - the girl is eager to learn them all.

Some fates are worse than death - a truth the Offering knows too well. When the torchlight fades and the heroes huddle for warmth, she does what she can to ease their pain; though her touch is not always welcome. A farmer's daughter only knows so much about certain "comforts."
As they enter the town, they can hear this organic beat, harmonized to the rythm of their footsteps.
Who is going to die now, really ?
Our blood pumps; their blood spills.
You remind me of those hands!
No. You seek what little I have left!
Life stains the soil. Feeds the earth.
Your ribs are still in the way...
Stay back! It's mine! It chose ME!
Wasted flesh! Only I am worthy!
The heart beats! Yours will burst!
A surge of adrenaline! The spilling of blood!
Dosh! Grab it while you can!
You still draw breath. You still have strength!
How it sings of our victory!
They are meat, ready to be ground!
The pulse - I cannot slow it!
I can feel your eyes on me!
Did you peek? Did you want to?
No fair! I want a turn!
The pipes! The pipes are calling!
It will rip the secrets from my flesh!
Feh. I won't bleed for you.
There's a leprechaun on my shoe!
The love is in your veins!
Strip the flesh! Salt the wound!
Your eyes are too close together!
Keep away from me! Keep away!
I see the way you look at us!
There is hunger in your eyes!
Ah, the flames! How they lick! How they bite!
To feel my flesh part once more, ah...
I saw that! Avert your eyes!
How did all this skin get on my arm?
Listen! How it plays like a drum!
Yes, yes! Come, leave your mark!
Flay my flesh! Break my body!
Please, I beg you; end my suffering.
...I'll cut this drum from my chest!
N-no! I'll not be led astray!
Such a rush! We can't stop now!
Mine! Mine, mine, mine, mine, MINE!
I showed you mine; show me yours!
I could do that. If I FELT like it.
Beat it like it beats me!
Did you get behind your ears?!
It will pluck the heart from your chest!
You did that on purpse, didn't you?!
Miss again, and I will feed you to the Heart!
Pants him! He must be pantsed!
It will eat you! And then it will eat me!
I knew it! I KNEW it!
No - I won't fall for it!
You want its secrets for your own!
No! Love blooms from my wounds!
I'll swallow my own blood first!
And what do you want in return?!
My wounds weep tears of joy!
Stop! In the name of love!
Aren't I to die for you?
Where did you hide those bells?!
Softening me up to snatch my Heart..!
But how else will the flesh peel?
No! It wants me to bleed!
You would take this from me?!
What's the point? My body fails.
No. The pulse must be stopped.
The Master wants you, but he can't have you!
I don't mind. Do you want to come closer?
Come; rest your heart with mine.

At home on the front lines, she stares at the flames with morbid fascination; the heart's pounding drowning out the smith's hammer. The Offering stands at the head of the group, more than happy to shield her allies from whatever might end the heart's beat.
No stranger to suffering, the Offering fanatically shields her allies from a similar demise. There are countless ways to stop a heart's beat - the girl is eager to learn them all.

Some fates are worse than death - a truth the Offering knows too well. When the torchlight fades and the heroes huddle for warmth, she does what she can to ease their pain; though her touch is not always welcome. A farmer's daughter only knows so much about certain "comforts."

Ah, the flames! How they lick! How they bite!
To feel my flesh part once more, ah...
I saw that! Avert your eyes!
How did all this skin get on my arm?
Listen! How it plays like a drum!
Yes, yes! Come, leave your mark!
Flay my flesh! Break my body!
Please, I beg you; end my suffering.
...I'll cut this drum from my chest!
N-no! I'll not be led astray!
Such a rush! We can't stop now!
Mine! Mine, mine, mine, mine, MINE!
I showed you mine; show me yours!
I could do that. If I FELT like it.
Beat it like it beats me!
Did you get behind your ears?!
It will pluck the heart from your chest!
You did that on purpse, didn't you?!
Miss again, and I will feed you to the Heart!
Pants him! He must be pantsed!
It will eat you! And then it will eat me!
I knew it! I KNEW it!
No - I won't fall for it!
You want its secrets for your own!
No! Love blooms from my wounds!
I'll swallow my own blood first!
And what do you want in return?!
My wounds weep tears of joy!
Stop! In the name of love!
Aren't I to die for you?
Where did you hide those bells?!
Softening me up to snatch my Heart..!
But how else will the flesh peel?
No! It wants me to bleed!
You would take this from me?!
What's the point? My body fails.
No. The pulse must be stopped.
The Master wants you, but he can't have you!
I don't mind. Do you want to come closer?
Come; rest your heart with mine.
战斗的最前线，她以病态的迷恋盯着火焰；心脏的冲击淹没了铁匠的锤子声。祭品带领队伍冲锋陷阵，非常乐意保护她的队友，来保护他们跳动的心脏声。
对于痛苦并不陌生，祭品热衷于保护她的队友免遭类似她自己的死亡。世上有数不尽的方法来停止心脏跳动，而这小女孩渴望学会全部。
有些命运比死亡还要凄惨——祭品她就很清楚这点。 当火把熄灭，英雄们为了温暖而蜷缩在一起时，她尽她所能来缓解他们的痛苦；虽然人们并不喜欢被她触碰。但一名农家的女孩就只懂得这些「安慰」。
当他们进入城镇时，他们能听到这些有机组织跳动的节拍，与他们脚步的节奏协调一致。
终结他们开始的一切吧
已经很不错了，一切本会更糟的
只要我们还活着，就不会输
…来吧，在我的怀里放下你的苦痛
啊啊啊…靠近点，再靠近点…
你不能我的什么都想要！
你听见死神的低语了吗？
你的肋骨妨碍到我拿走心脏了…
退后！它是我的！它选了我！
哈…太棒了…太棒了…啊啊啊！
我听见你的弱点在低语了！
啊啊啊…如此美妙的音乐！
我们心心相印，同舟共济
让我们一起突破自己吧…过来，躺在我的身上…
你的心在有力地跳动着，你不会倒下！
肾上腺素注入！威力全开！
死亡只是一个重置而已
只要你还能呼吸，你就还有力量！
你听见死神的低语了吗？
心跳的好快，我没法让它安静下来！
伤害我…鞭笞我…折磨我…啊啊啊…太棒了…啊啊啊！
…每个伤疤，都是你给我难忘的亲吻…
…你们为什么把我带到这里来？你们本该好好疼爱我的！
你在偷看我！你想搂着我吗？你想摸我吗？
你的钱包掉了，就在我双脚下，蹲下来捡吧
这，在我的身体里留下你的痕迹吧！
啊啊啊，太棒了，吸干我们的血，榨干我们吧！
你不想尝尝我的身体吗？
不公平！应该轮到我来榨干你了！
啊！身体里的导管，在报错了！
不 不 不 不
它们会撕开我的身体，夺走我的秘密！
我的鞋子上有一只可爱的小妖精！
这是我的身体，我想干嘛就干嘛！
我肉体上另一个新的痕迹！
尝尝我身体被蹂躏的狂喜！
别一直盯着我的身体看！
我知道你打着我身体的主意！
你的眼里充满着肉欲和饥渴！
哈，又能感觉到身体的温度了
别色眯眯地盯着我！我看见了！
这一切什么时候才会终止？
这些皮肤是怎么到我手臂上来的？
啊啊啊…太棒了…太棒了！在我身体里留下你的痕迹吧！
你不想尝尝我的身体吗？
别来了！停止那个声音吧！
…我要把我的心脏从我的胸腔里挖出来！
不！我不要再被你们蒙骗了！
如此匆忙！我们现在不能撤退！
这个声音便是我的赞歌！
我的，我的，我的，全是我的！
你看了我的血了，现在我要看看你的！
我也能做到的，要是我想的话
它会把你的心脏从你的胸腔里挖出来！
这下你把我们全都害死了！
你故意打不中的！不是吗！
啊哈！我就知道你是故意打不中的！
如果你再打偏，我就把你心脏掏出来！
把他裤子脱了！他必须被惩罚！
它会吃了你！然后吃了我！
不！爱在我的伤口上开花了！
我在你身上闻到了死亡的味道！
我会先吞下我自己的血！
不！我还没吃完我的晚饭！
然后作为回报你想要什么？！
别管我！我的伤口虽然痛但它们很开心！
别管我！以爱之名，让我流血吧！
不要！这伤痛的感觉太爽了！
我会喝一些星星来治疗自己的！
你原来都把这些铃铛藏哪儿了？
给我力量？以什么代价？我的身体？
心跳就够了，不用你的力量！
你是想让我放下警惕好拿走我的心吧？
不在战斗中死去，那这个肉体还有什么意义？
还有什么用？我的身体已经崩坏了
主人想要你，但他不能拥有你！
嘘！看我身体里的泡沫越来越多了！
靠近我，让我们在一起，放松自己的心

At home on the front lines, she stares at the flames with morbid fascination; the heart's pounding drowning out the smith's hammer. The Offering stands at the head of the group, more than happy to shield her allies from whatever might end the heart's beat.
No stranger to suffering, the Offering fanatically shields her allies from a similar demise. There are countless ways to stop a heart's beat - the girl is eager to learn them all.

Some fates are worse than death - a truth the Offering knows too well. When the torchlight fades and the heroes huddle for warmth, she does what she can to ease their pain; though her touch is not always welcome. A farmer's daughter only knows so much about certain "comforts."
As they enter the town, they can hear this organic beat, harmonized to the rythm of their footsteps.
Who is going to die now, really ?
Our blood pumps; their blood spills.
You remind me of those hands!
No. You seek what little I have left!
Life stains the soil. Feeds the earth.
Your ribs are still in the way...
Stay back! It's mine! It chose ME!
Wasted flesh! Only I am worthy!
The heart beats! Yours will burst!
A surge of adrenaline! The spilling of blood!
Dosh! Grab it while you can!
You still draw breath. You still have strength!
How it sings of our victory!
They are meat, ready to be ground!
The pulse - I cannot slow it!
I can feel your eyes on me!
Did you peek? Did you want to?
No fair! I want a turn!
The pipes! The pipes are calling!
It will rip the secrets from my flesh!
Feh. I won't bleed for you.
There's a leprechaun on my shoe!
The love is in your veins!
Strip the flesh! Salt the wound!
Your eyes are too close together!
Keep away from me! Keep away!
I see the way you look at us!
There is hunger in your eyes!
Ah, the flames! How they lick! How they bite!
To feel my flesh part once more, ah...
I saw that! Avert your eyes!
How did all this skin get on my arm?
Listen! How it plays like a drum!
Yes, yes! Come, leave your mark!
Flay my flesh! Break my body!
Please, I beg you; end my suffering.
...I'll cut this drum from my chest!
N-no! I'll not be led astray!
Such a rush! We can't stop now!
Mine! Mine, mine, mine, mine, MINE!
I showed you mine; show me yours!
I could do that. If I FELT like it.
Beat it like it beats me!
Did you get behind your ears?!
It will pluck the heart from your chest!
You did that on purpse, didn't you?!
Miss again, and I will feed you to the Heart!
Pants him! He must be pantsed!
It will eat you! And then it will eat me!
I knew it! I KNEW it!
No - I won't fall for it!
You want its secrets for your own!
No! Love blooms from my wounds!
I'll swallow my own blood first!
And what do you want in return?!
My wounds weep tears of joy!
Stop! In the name of love!
Aren't I to die for you?
Where did you hide those bells?!
Softening me up to snatch my Heart..!
But how else will the flesh peel?
No! It wants me to bleed!
You would take this from me?!
What's the point? My body fails.
No. The pulse must be stopped.
The Master wants you, but he can't have you!
I don't mind. Do you want to come closer?
Come; rest your heart with mine.
